# MPChangeLanguageOptionSetting.permanent

**Case**

The language option change is applied to all future playback items.

## Declaration

```swift
case permanent
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **MPChangeLanguageOptionSetting.none**: No language option change is to be made.
- **MPChangeLanguageOptionSetting.nowPlayingItemOnly**: The language option change is applied to the now playing item only.

items.description: No language option change is to be made.

items.description: The language option change is applied to the now playing item only.
